title: Your Programs

rigo-chat.welcome-message: Hi {{firstName}}! I see you are on the course {{cohortName}}. Is there anything you would like to know about it?

enroll-programs: Enroll in one of our programs!
not-enrolled: You are not enrolled in any cohort

invite.notify: Hey! There are {{cohortInvitationWord}} for you to accept.

finished.plural: There are {{finishedCohorts}} programs you have already finished.
finished.singular: There is {{finishedCohorts}} program you have already finished.

roles-info: Roles are only displayed in development mode
description: These are the courses and cohorts that we found you are currently taking, please choose the course you want to take today:

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.connect-rigobot-text: You need to connect to Rigo AI in order to obtain feedback.
feedback.why-feedback-text: Feedback plays an important role when learning technical skills
feedback.no-code-reviews-text: You have not received any feedback yet
feedback.start-interacting: Start interacting with your mentor or with your assignments to receive feedback here.
feedback.connect-github-connector: before you can use Rigobot and get feedback on your code.

late-payment.title: Action Required: Late Payments
late-payment.description: Your account has pending payments for cohort {{cohort_name}}. Please contact {{academy_name}} coordinator to restore full access to all features. Thank you for your prompt attention.
